description:
Every night you brave the highway, life-bound to a single promise: "Your pie in thirty minutes or you can have it free."  People can respect that.  You are a role model.  A hero to the hungry.

You gain +1 quickness for each level of normality distortion.

I swear by Apollo the Healer, by Asclepius, by Hygieia, by Panacea, and by all the gods and goddesses, making them my witnesses, that I shall deliver, according to my ability and judgment, death.

You temporarily deal 50% more damage after being hurt.  The first time you bandage or disinfect a limb, it instantly heals by 10hp in addition to normal effects.

We call this a tactical retreat.

You gain +50 movement speed for few moments after successfully dealing ballistic damage.

Error.  418 //I am a teapot.

Every 20 seconds, there's a small chance for nearby robots to become permanently friendly.

A lifetime ago you swore to protect your vanished homeland.  This oath binds you still.

You cannot flee from high danger enemies but gain increased damage and stamina regeneration when fighting them.

Your cybernetic implants are constantly losing power, but a quirk of their design allows you regain power through murder.

You lose bionic power every second, but melee kills restore power, scaling with the danger level of your target.
//: Idea here is they can't have any NEW bionics because they're full up (and so they can't just cheat by finding fuel bionics)
